column5: Hey all i just bought a pair of hodgman wadelite horco tex hip waders for 90 dollars down from 159.00,did i get a decent deal? and will they hold up in bush whacking environment?anybody own a pair? thanks in advance
decent deal on a nice entry level breathable wader. even $600 dollar simms are gonna get holes bushwacking.  get yourself some aquaseal and you'll never wear rubber or neo waders again.
